title: Married By Christmas
description: Anna Carter is on the brink of her dream Christmas wedding: sheâ€™s got the dress sorted, the church booked, even the reindeer to pull her in a sleigh to the ceremony. But now - only two weeks before her big day - her perfect husband-to-be drops a bombshell...Only nothing's going to stop Anna's plans - not even the pesky inconvenience of discovering her groom already has a wife!
author: Scarlett Bailey
